usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all major section headers and hero text. Do not use for UI labels.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all chat text, inputs, and UI elements.
usage_rules.contrast: Ensure headings in Dark Mode are not pure white; use off-white or pale green.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF6B35] hover:bg-[#CC5500] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#1B4D3E] text-[#1B4D3E] dark:border-[#81C784] dark:text-[#81C784] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-[#1B4D3E]/5 transition-all

chat_bubbles.sent: bg-[#FF6B35] text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-4 py-2 shadow-sm
chat_bubbles.received: bg-white dark:bg-[#1A2F25] border border-border text-foreground rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-4 py-2 shadow-sm

inputs.default: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-[#FF6B35] rounded-none px-0 py-2 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus:outline-none

cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all

grids.marketing_hero: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 p-8 md:p-12

layouts.chat_interface: flex flex-col h-full w-full relative bg-background/50 backdrop-blur-sm

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on orange backgrounds is White or extremely dark. Do not use grey on orange.

media.image_style: Rounded corners (xl or 2xl). Use aspect-video for posts, aspect-square for avatars.

landing_hero.description: Modern interior design living room with natural light

auth_background.description: Abstract architectural details with orange and green tones

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Vibgyor Chats' brand using the Orange (#FF6B35) and Green (#1B4D3E) palette.
Use 'Playfair Display' for the 'Vibgyor' logo and all major headings to emphasize the Interior Design niche.
The Chat Interface must feel like a 'Workspace' - clean, organized, with a 'Control Room' grid layout.
For the Auth Page, use the 'auth_background' image on one side and a clean form on the other.
Implement Dark/Light mode toggle immediately using Tailwind's 'dark' class strategy.
Ensure the 'Role-based mentions' feature visually highlights the mentioned role (e.g., @designers in Orange pill).
Use the provided Pexels images for the landing page and demo content.
Do not use generic 'blue' for primary actions; use the Brand Orange.
Ensure the sidebar is collapsible or minimal to maximize chat space.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs; use generous spacing (p-6, p-8) and unique typography pairings.
Never use 'transition: all'; animate specific properties like 'transform', 'opacity', 'colors'.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
Components must be exported as named exports; Pages as default exports.
